summary: I HAVE A RECURRING PROBLEM WHEN TRAVELING OVER BUMPS IN ROAD AND BRAKING.  MY ABS WILL MAKE A NOISE, AND BRAKING ACTION WILL STOP, EVEN WHEN I AM PUSHING THE BRAKE PEDAL TO ALMOST THE FLOOR, UNTIL I PASS OVER THE BUMPS.  AT THAT TIME, BRAKING ACTION RE-ENGAGES.  I FIRST REPORTED THIS ON 8/04/99.
